modName: Final Fantasy - Tales - Persona Spell Names -RPG Spell Names-
summary: This mod aims to change the way the the spells in default Skyrim are named. For example, instead of Flames you have Fire, instead of Healing you have Cure.
descriptionHtml:
[size=26][color=red]I am no longer updating this mod.[/color][/size]
[color=blue]However, it should still work without issues[/color]

This mod aims to change the way the the spells in default Skyrim are named. For example, instead of Flames you have Flare, instead of Lightning Bolt you have Thundara.

[i]Original Spell Name[/i] = Final Fantasy / Persona / Tales

[u][b]Destruction[/b][/u]

[b]Fire School[/b]
Flames = Fire Agi Fire Ball
Firebolt = Fira Agilao Flame Lance
Fireball = Firaga Maragidyne Eruption
Incinerate = Firaja Agidyne Spiral Flame
Fire Storm = Firus Ragnarok Explosion

[b]Frost School[/b]
Frostbite = Blizzard Bufu Icicle
Ice Spike = Blizzara Bufula Freeze Lancer
Ice Storm = Blizzaga Mabufudyne Ice Tornado
Icy Spear = Blizzaja Bufudyne Absolute
Blizzard = Blizzarus Nilfheim Blizzard

[b]Shock School[/b]
Sparks = Thunder Zio Lightning
Lightning Bolt = Thundara Zionga Spark Wave
Chain Lightning = Thundaga Maziodyne Thunder Blade
Thunderbolt = Thundaja Ziodyne Thunder Arrow
Lightning Storm = Thundus Thunder Reign Indignation

[b][u]Illusion[/u][/b]

Invisiblity = Shadow Evade Physical Dark Mist

[i]More coming in illusion soon[/i]

[b][u]Restoration[/u][/b]

[b]Self[/b]
Healing = Cure Dia First Aid
Fast Healing = Cura Diarama Heal
Close Wounds = Curaga Diarahan Cure
Guardian Circle = Curaja Salvation Healing Circle

[b]Other[/b]
Healing Hands = Heal Media Nurse
Heal Other = Heala Mediarama Revitalize
Grand Healing = Healaga Mediarahan Fairy Circle

[b]Undead[/b]
Turn Lesser Undead = Dia Megido Photon
Turn Undead = Diara Megidola Holy Song
Turn Greater Undead = Diaga Megidolaon Grand Cross
Bane of the Undead = Diaja Morning Star Judgement

[b]Ward[/b]
Lesser Ward= Shell Rakukaja Force Field
Steadfast Ward = Shella Marakukaja Resist
Greater Ward = Shellaga Heat Riser Anti-Magic

[u][b]Conjuration[/b][/u]

Conjure Flame Atronach= Summon Ifrit / Summon Efreet / Summon Hua Po
Conjure Frost Atronach= Summon Shiva / Summon Celsius / Summon Jack Frost
Conjure Storm Atronach= Summon Ramuh / Summon Volt / Summon Take-Minakata
Conjure Dremora Lord= Summon Diabolos / Summon Shadow / Summon Belial
Flame Thrall= Summon Ifrit *LIMIT BREAK* / Summon Efreet *OVERLIMIT* / Summon Surt
Frost Thrall= Summon Shiva *LIMIT BREAK* / Summon Celsius *OVERLIMIT* / Summon Loki
Storm Thrall= Summon Ramuh *LIMIT BREAK* / Summon Volt *OVERLIMIT* / Summon Thor

[b][i][u]*MORE TO COME*[/u][/i][/b]

[u][i]To-Do list[/i][/u]
• [s]Persona Spell Support[/s]
• Dragon Quest Spell Support ( Will be done faster if more people request this)
• [s]Installer[/s]
• [i]Full Metal Alchemist[/i] Atronach Forge Recipes (May take long)
• RPG Weapons Support... (if enough people like this idea)
• Spell Tomes (expect it to come late)
• [s]Tales Spell Support[/s]
• Blue Dragon Spell Support (one of my all-time favorite games, if I get any free time this will be the result)
• Phantasy Star 4 Spell Support (more requests = less wait time)

I am planning for more custom names to be added to the rest of the schools. If you have any recommendations dont hesistate to tell me in the comments or via PM.

Thanks for reading and make sure to try out my other mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31636]Miraak's Sword Recharged[/url]
author: MinebyNight
